extendedInfo.description: Ever found hard to track money in your friend circle?Wish to track expenses on a group travel?Hope to get easy way to clear debts in friends?Find it hard to answer Who owes whom and how much?Try Hisab to calculate who owes whom in your circle or a trip or family or any where with minimum number of transactions.The word HisÄb is originated from Hindi language which means "to calculate". The name speaks for its purpose. With HisÄb you can add people to your list, add expenses, with every expense you can select who paid for that particular expense and who was included in that expense (yeah, not just dividing equally!). You can settle all your debts in minimum number of payments with just one click. From now on, you won`t have to write down your expenses from memory after a tiring trip or that unbearable hangover.Key features:A. Add and remove people on the fly.B. Enter Expenses and divide them among only those who were involved.C. View entered expenses in a list.D. Compute minimum number of payments required to settle all debts.Kindly take time to send your feedback. We hope we shall improve app further to enhance your experience. Even more, we would love to know how it made your life and friendship even more fun!For user manual visit: www.click4tab.com/hisabDevelopers: Ayush & Sumit

reviews.title: App is not working correctly
reviews.comment: Hi I am using the app on nexus 4 and it is not working properly. I have add few expenses but after clicking on compute it shows that expense already settled.
reviews.author: Sumit Rajan Singh

reviews.comment: Mst app he yaar,,,very simple for daily expenses with friends...

reviews.comment: This is d best app that i\'ve come across till date for doing hisaab wid my friends.. Thanks developer..:)
reviews.author: Rohit Jain

reviews.title: Strong need!
reviews.comment: Utility perspective - great, as we can skip Google docs now Features - it is still not useful as anyone in the group can\'t add or edit entrees. If only one person has to do this, it is not useful. Make it a shared database, and it will be perfect! UI- love the simplicity, add a little color though :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: new update not working for galaxy nexus i9250
reviews.comment: After the new update, the app Force closes when creating new group or when using existing group.
